page.title: 04GOYTRE FAWR PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Goytre Fawr}Junior and Infant School is a flat-roofed,black and white building with many,many windows. The school was built in 1976 to take about 200 children.There are 28 areas which include a main library and a hall, which is used for P.E. and as a canteen. The school is an {open-plan} design and can be very noisy at times because there are not enough doors.At the moment there are 130 children at the school aged from{5 years}to{11 {years} of age.There are five class teachers and a headteacher.Our school has it's own kitchen and supplies meals to two other small schools. Our school has a playing field and two playgrounds,one of which has a netball court marked out on it.Across the field there is an embankment for the railway line.
